input.sentences: crafts shows can be an interesting place to shop
you never know what you will find and like
but fun is usually had by all
output.sentences: The local shops were abuzz with a sale at the candle store.
The graffiti in the neighborhood was inviting with bright colors.
There was a design of a demon with lightning shooting out of his eyes.
A cage hung from a telephone pole, decoratively.
Hammocks were inviting to anyone who was interested in getting some rest.
